articles.title: Christmas Number 1: LadBaby retains strong lead, Boris Johnson protest song enters Top 10 - Official Charts Company

articles.content: With just 48 hours of the chart week left in the race to the 2020 Official Christmas Number 1, social media star LadBaby retains a strong lead ahead of Mariah Carey, while a protest song about Boris … [+2833 chars]
